channel.title: Recoloured whip attack emote, it punches. help
channel.description:
I replaced ints with the recolored ones. I am not worried about adding special attack yet (will be using tuts on here).
When i attack with my custom whip, the attack emote is a punch. how do i get the attack emote to be like the regular abbysal whip?
Thanks

item.title: Recoloured whip attack emote, it punches. help
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

If youâ€™ve changed the id of the item, you need to change the attacking animation for the weapon.

Usually in combat, item assistant or something similar.

Read full topic
item.source: Recoloured whip attack emote, it punches. help

item.title: Recoloured whip attack emote, it punches. help

just to make it easier, you should post the general area of the code. but, it sounds like you just coulda changed the emote id to something that doesnt exist, just look for it and see if it looks weird.
